Class XmlContentParserItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • dfischer.utils.XmlContentParserItem

  • public class XmlContentParserItem
extends java.lang.Object
    Internal data of a parsed XML node.
    See Also:
    XmlContentParser

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getAttributeName()
      Returns the name of a marked attribute, or null if no attribute has been marked.
      com.room4me.xml.Node getNode()
      Returns all data about the XML node
      int getNodeNumber()
      Returns the unique number of the node (the nodes are consecutively numbered)
      int getOccurrenceCount()
      Returns the occurrence count of the XML path within the document.
      java.lang.String getXmlPath()
      Returns the XML path to the node.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns debug output about the node.
